column4: Sealed in an envelope is a trump card.
A powerful but feminine voice says: @@For thy victory I give thee these @@ sandals to make thee quick and agile.
After some prying a small chest @@ opens to reveal a potion vial.
You find a dainty little crown.
A helm glowing with runes floats @@ in midair before you.
A chain-mail coat gleems with an @@ almost magical lustre.
A cloak dances to and fro before you.
There is a glistening breastplate that @@ looks as if it was made just for you.
A straight  single-edged  evil-looking @@ sword of oriental design lies here.
A curious-looking stone fastens @@ itself around your neck.
Directions on a small vial here read: @@ 1. Pour over hands.  @@ 2. Rub hands firmly.
A sword protrudes from a slab @@ of black marble.
A katana in a ribbed black lacquered @@ scabbard rests against a wall. @@ A pattern of snowflakes has been @@ honed along its single edge.
There is a small rectangular @@ sharpening stone here.
Signs of a great battle between a @@ single warrior and a dozen or more @@ adversaries litter this room. @@ Clutched tightly to the warrior's @@ remains is a bottle filled with @@ green liquid.
Inscribed on the blade of a dagger @@ are the words: @@ Fear not The Reaper

The decaying remains of an adventurer @@ sporting a bush hat and a very nasty @@ knife are here. Inscribed on the broken @@ blade is the word '  G'day  '.  Lying next @@ to him are six tall metal cylinders.
There is golden helm with @@ thirteen jewels here.
A crossbow of incredibly fine @@ mechanical workmanship lies here.
A blue-violet quartz rod lies @@ on a purple dais.
A note reads: ||  Congratulations my good  ^^ on @@ getting this far. @@ A friend
There are 10 quarrels in @@ a metallic clip here.
There is a long electrum rod here.
There is a dark cowl here.
A golden apple rests on a golden @@ pillow.  Inscribed on the apple @@ are the words: @@ For the pretty one.
There is evidence of small @@ weapons fire here.
There are some disgusting stains @@ on the floor and an odd looking @@ silvery quilted vest.
An energy pistol is hanging @@ on a wall rack.
